verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Savior I come
Quiet my soul remember
Redemptions hill
Where your blood was spilled
For my ransom

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Everything I once held dear
I count it all as lost

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Lead me to the cross
where your love poured out
Bring me to my knees
Lord I lay me down
Rid me of myself
I belong to you
Lead me,
Lead me to the cross

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
You were as I
Tempted and trialed
You are
The word became flesh
Bore my sin and death
Now You're risen

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
To your heart
To your heart
Lead me to your heart
Lead me to your heart
